channel.title: Release Notes - 2008 on Releases - aspose.com
channel.description: Recent content in Release Notes - 2008 on Releases - aspose.com

item.title: Aspose.Cells for Java v1.9.5 Hotfix Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.Cells for Java v1.9.5 Hotfix Dear Customers, We have released Aspose.Cells for Java V1.9.5! *What’s New? Supports to recognize Excel file format automatically for Workbook.open(String) and Workbook.open(InputStream)* Supports to process cells in spreadsheet file in Event-Driven mode by introducing new API(LightCells)* Supports to remove shape related Object, including Comment, Picture, and so on* Supports to copy shapes when copy workbook or worksheet* Supports to check whether a cell or style is Percent or Date *What’s Improved?

item.title: Aspose.Cells for Java V1.9.4 Hot Fix Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.Cells for Java V1.9.4 Hot Fix What’s New? Supports to add rich text for shapes such as Arc, Oval, Rectangle, Comment, TextBox Supports all type of placement for shape Supports to read all shapes from template Supports to set array in SmartMarker What’s Improved? Add new methods to manipulate shape’s position and size, and deprecated some old methods Add some demo codes and templates for new API Replace deprecated API invocation with new API in demos What’s Fixed?

item.title: Aspose.Cells for Java 1.9.3 Hot Fix Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.Cells for Java 1.9.3 Hot Fix Dear Customers, We have released Aspose.Cells for Java V1.9.3! What’s New? Supports to add Arc, Oval, Rectangle Supports to add Word and Excel file as OLE object Supports to only load data and formatting in the template file Supports to copy style when insert rows and columns Supports to get number format type of cell Supports to filter non-blank/blank cells in AutoFilter What’s Improved?
